tha-ap18:9.2: vissakammena māpito → vissakammena nimmito (bj); visukammena māpito (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap18:10.1: Dasasaddāvivittaṁ taṁ → dasa saddā avivittaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap18:14.1: Sacevaseyya agāraṁ → sace vaseyyāgāraṁ (bj); sace vaseyya āgāraṁ (pts-vp-pli1); sacā'vaseyya (?)
tha-ap18:16.4: evaṁ rakkhiṁ mahāmuni → evaṁ rakkhiṁ mahāmune (bj); mamaṁ dakkhi mahāmuni (sya1ed, sya2ed); mamaṁ rakkhi mahāmuni (pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed) 19Th1.A:7 (22 piṭṭhe)
